page.title: 09Radley Village Shops
page.content: The Post Office sells stationery, groceries, pharmacy and newspapers etc, As well as giving pensions and withdrawing money from your bank account etc. The Village Store sells groceries, meat, frozen foods and fresh fruit and veg. and other foods on a small scale. E. Kitchings sells fresh fruit, gifts, sweets and reen-grocery. They also sell convienence foods; they also arrange the paper rounds. It sells all National papers and 3 locals, 7 women's mags, 4 general, 2 mens and 28 childrens. Aqua Video is now carrying on in new management, but many businesse in the past have tried to start a company there and not succeeded. Before them there was a fishing tackle shop. Aqua Video sells and hires Video Cassettes and also sells pet fish and aquarium requisites.
